title: ENERGY Aromatherapy Body Lotion | Coconut Dreams Skincare
description: Crafted with lemon, verbena, mint, and fir needle. Our aromatherapy body lotion is crafted with pure coconut milk, aloe and honey to keep your skin moisturized and nourished. Formulated without parabens, alcohol and petroleum. All our products are vegan, cruelty-free and handcrafted in small batches. Made in USA.
cleaned_text: Experience mind, body and soul rejuvenation with our luxurious ENERGY Aromatherapy Body Lotion. Handcrafted with pure botanical extracts, and powered by bergamot, lemon peel, and peppermint essential oils, this lightweight, quickly absorbed lotion will provide an indulgent experience that is both warming, soothing, and delicately invigorating your senses while leaving your skin silky smooth.
